attributes.action: do not rename Brixton to East Clapham
attributes.additional_details:
Although Brixton may not have the most pleasant history, it has still attracted many people and its history is quite symbolic. Simply because it has become 'trendy' does not mean we should rename it due to shifting demographics. We can have a new Brixton without renaming it.
All I ask is to prevent the name change of Brixton to 'East Clapham', or any other name.
